0:
”Alexa, open Bob Bittner's memory station”
”Alexa, play Bob Bittner's memory station”
”Alexa, start Bob Bittner's memory station”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bob bittner's memory station
Developer Terms of Use
des: Bob’s Memory Station was created in memory of Bob Bittner to give listeners the ability to continue to enjoy Bob’s playlists that so many of you enjoyed on Bob’s radio stations.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
